info.name: Hotmail - OrangeFlame
info.description:
A dark Hotmail login screen with an orange flame.

This theme is compatible with my other Hotmail webmail theme.
info.additionalInfo:
You can get my other Hotmail related theme here for webmail. http://userstyles.org/styles/82023/hotmail-orangemail This theme was created with the help of user Mindflyer code that allowed me to remove some original elements the style was
